body: Damn, is she gonna have a decent ending with all that befallen tragedies happening to her since the start? 2 years and more and no ENG-TL version nor X12 yet.... From a previous comment by Eltole, he planned to write Milt to get knocked up with 2nd child while escaping perhaps with Raleigh by coincidence. Eltole knew that story wasn't pushing forward the way he wanted to so he might try to get it moving forward a bit. I just hope for a decent ending for Milt man... Fuck I just spent an hour reading the entire series page by page.
Can you please finish this series
been waiting 2 years for en version
Are you telling me milt actually gets saved?
